item.title: Stargate MMORPG
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Another star MMOG — MGM announces Stargate MMORPG. Based on the TV series (that I never watched) Stargate SG-1 and Stargate Atlantis, Cheyenne Mountain Entertainment (don’t know ’em), the developer, has more here. I did see the movie Stargate, so … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Another star MMOG — MGM announces Stargate MMORPG. Based on the TV series (that I never watched) Stargate SG-1 and Stargate Atlantis, Cheyenne Mountain Entertainment (don’t know ’em), the developer, has more here. I did see the movie Stargate, so I’ll assume this is about stars and pyramids and Kurt Russell.

item.title: 10 Most Interesting People in Gaming for 2005
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Grimwell, formerly of Grimwell, now of GamerGod, presents his list of The 10 Most Interesting People in Gaming for 2005, including the Hot Coffee dude, the licker, Chief Nazgul Smedley, everyone’s favorite gaming Grandma (yay!), and Mr. Jenkins. I can … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Grimwell, formerly of Grimwell, now of GamerGod, presents his list of The 10 Most Interesting People in Gaming for 2005, including the Hot Coffee dude, the licker, Chief Nazgul Smedley, everyone’s favorite gaming Grandma (yay!), and Mr. Jenkins. I can see two attention whores on that list that should be scratched off immediately before they consume any more bandwidth.

item.title: Evil Developer Demographics
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Game Developer Demographics — other demographics not reported: 99.9% are pure evil, 87% are elves, 12% human, 1% jackal, 23% are sadists, 68% play their own games (masochists) and only 12% return their shopping carts to the cart corral. This … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Game Developer Demographics — other demographics not reported: 99.9% are pure evil, 87% are elves, 12% human, 1% jackal, 23% are sadists, 68% play their own games (masochists) and only 12% return their shopping carts to the cart corral. This is all from my own anecdotal research, however, and may not be statistically sound.

item.title: Gangs of New York
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Gangs of New York — NY Times profile of Rockstar Games’ and its founders/brothers, Dan and Sam Houser. (Here’s some photos of the brothers. Pfff, I’m not saying that explains anything.)
item.content:encoded: Gangs of New York — NY Times profile of Rockstar Games’ and its founders/brothers, Dan and Sam Houser. (Here’s some photos of the brothers. Pfff, I’m not saying that explains anything.)
